roleset.name: cauterize again
roleset.note: RECAUTERIZE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to cauterize.01. Cauterize is a member of Vn class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from recauterize.01-v)

example.name: painting such a lovely picture
example.text: The stumps of his appendages oozed here and there, and I recauterized them to stop the slow bleeding.
